name: Slay The Hero
description:
Spawn minions and stop the hero from reaching the castle!

WASD to move, Space to spawn your goblin army.

Entry for the Bored Pixel Jam 2021.
We didn't make it in time, so there is much to be desired.

Coding and shifting stuff around inside Unity: By me
Character Sprites: Chocolotl
Level Design, Level Art, Title Image: SketchyGhost

Made with Unity and parts of the More Mountains Top Down Engine
